loans.name: Wilian Alexander

texts.es:
Willian, se dedica a la crianza y engorde de pollos, tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 16 y 11 años, él se dedica a la crianza de pollos, tiene 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, lo atiende personalmente.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de pollos de un día de nacidos, concentrado para la alimentación de ellos, esto ayudara a que Willian incremente su granja, potenciando más su negocio y las oportunidades de crecimiento.
Las aspiraciones de él es construir su propia casa, para su familia, y ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios para que se preparen.
texts.en:
Willian raises chickens.  He’s 39 years old and lives with his wife and two children who are 16 and 11 years old.  He raises chickens and has ten years’ experience in the business; he tends to it personally.

He’s asking for a loan to buy one-day-old chicks and feed concentrate for them.  This will help Willian to increase the size of his farm making his business potentially more productive and adding opportunities for growth.

His hope is to build his own house for his family and to help his children with their schooling so that they will be prepared.

loans.use: to buy one-day-old chicks and feed concentrate.

loans.name: Gerber Antonio

texts.es:
Gerber, vive con su familia en casa familiar, él está divorciado actualmente, pero vela por los ingresos de dos hijos de 17 y 14 años de edad, él posee una carpintería desde hace 5 años, elabora sillas, mesas, su horario es de 8:00am hasta las 6:00pm.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de madera de conacaste, cedro y pino, para la elaboración de los muebles,  este préstamo le ayudara para mantener lo necesario para realizar sus trabajos, teniendo muebles para ofrecer.
Su aspiración es que su taller crezca y poder emplear a más personas para agilizar los trabajos y la calidad.
texts.en:
Gerber lives with his family in the family home.  He’s currently divorced but covers the expenses of his two children who are 17 and 14 years old.  He’s had a carpentry shop for five years.  He manufactures chairs and tables and his work schedule is 8am to 6pm

He’s asking for a loan to buy several types of lumber like cedar, pine and others to make the furniture.  This loan will help him have what he needs to do his jobs and to have furniture to sell.

His hope is that his shop will grow and he can start to employ people to do quality jobs more quickly.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is married and has two children.  He lives in Hioma, Uganda.  He is a farmer, which he has been doing for eight years. 

Patrick is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy rice to plant.  He is faced by challenges of price fluctuations and seasonal weather variations. His family goal is to educate his children and build a permanent house. His business goal is to buy more land to grow crops and hire employees to help in farming.

loans.use: to buy rice for planting.

loans.name: Husen

texts.ru: Хусен женат, он добрый и трудолюбивый человек. На воспитании имеет четверых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Хусен занимается купле- продажей хозяйственных товаров и мебели. Торгует в арендованном магазине. В бизнесе помогает брат. За товаром ездит в соседней город 2-3 раза в месяц. Начало бизнес принадлежит его брату, который сейчас имеет торговую точку в городе Ростов Российской Федерации. После его отъезда весь бизнес перешел  Хусену и он владеет этим бизнесом. Хусен хотел бы получить займ для покупки хозяйственных товаров и мебели, с целью увлечения товарооборота. Хусен надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Husen is married; he is a kind and hardworking person.  He is raising four children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Husen is involved in buying and selling household goods and furniture.  He sells goods in a leased store.  His brother helps him with the business.  Husen travels for merchandise to a neighboring city 2-3 times per month.  His brother, who now has a retail outlet in the city of Rostov, Russian Federation, started this business.  After his departure, the whole business was transitioned to Husen, and now he owns this business.  Husen wants to obtain this loan to buy household goods and furniture in order to increase his goods turnover.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase household goods and furniture

loans.name: Mohsharif

texts.ru: Мохшариф жительница района Рудаки. Ей 49 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Мохшариф портниха, она занимается шитьем у себя дома. В этой области она десять лет. Кредит берет для приобретения швейной машинки, тканей и ниток.
texts.en: Mohsharif is a resident of the Rudaki district.  She is 49 years old, married and has three children.  Mohsharif is a seamstress; she is involved in sewing at home.  She has been in this business for ten years.  Mohsharif is requesting this loan to buy a sewing machine, fabrics and threads.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabrics and threads

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe es un hombre de 69 años de edad, de estado civil casado, sin hijos a su cargo; Vive en casa propia con su esposa de 65 años de edad y una hija mayor que los cuida, reside en el Caserío Hualtaco  del Distrito de Tambogrande, departamento de Piura. Además no cuentan con los servicios básicos, el consumo de agua lo hacen a través de norias artesanales; bajo estas condiciones viven la mayoría de familias.

La actividad principal que desarrolla Felipe es la venta de leche fresca, esta la realiza en el mercado central de esta zona, donde ya cuenta con clientes ya fidelizados, esta actividad la desarrolla desde hace más de cuatro años; además cuenta con 1,5 has de terreno agrícola sembrados de cultivo de limón, en donde cosecha semanalmente y los comercializa a los mayoristas de la zona; su cónyuge también se dedica a la crianza de  ovinos y aves de corral, donde le permite tener otros ingresos adicionales.


El monto del  crédito otorgado  será de S/. 1,200 nuevos soles y será  para el  mantenimiento  del cultivo de limón, y para la compra de alimento balanceado para el ganado lechero, de esta forma le va permitir mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Felipe is a 69-year-old gentleman who is married and has no dependent children. He lives in his own home with his wife, age 65, and a grown daughter who cares for them. They reside in the village of Hualtaco in the District of Tambogrande, Department of Piura. This area has no basic services and the drinking water must travel through artesian wells. Most of the families that reside here must live under these conditions.

Felipe's main business is selling fresh cheese at the central market in the area, where he has loyal customers. He has been in this business for more than four years. He also has 1.5 hectares of farmland on which he grows limes, which are harvested weekly and sold to local wholesalers. His wife also raises sheep and poultry as a way of generating additional income.

The loan amount of 1,200 PEN will be used to maintain his crop of limes and to purchase balanced feed for his dairy cows. This will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his dairy cows and to pay for maintenance of his lime crop.

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Её муж является таксистом в Российской Федерации. Более 8 лет занимается вышиванием золотошвейных изделий (накидка для невест). Она начала данный бизнес в 2004 году. Этим видом бизнеса она занимается дома, а реализует готовый товар на рынке. Имеет постоянных клиентов. Начала данный бизнес с собственными денежными средствами. Она хотела бы получить займ для ремонта своего дома, точнее для покупки пластиковых окон, дверей и ДВП.
texts.en: Gulchehra is married and a loving mother of four children.  Her husband is a taxi driver in the Russian Federation.  Gulchehra has been involved in making gold embroidery goods (cape for brides).  She started this business in 2004.  She is involved in this business at home and sells ready merchandise at a market.  She has regular customers.  Gulchehra started this business with her own money.  She wants to obtain this loan to repair her house, specifically to buy plastic windows, doors and fiberboard.

loans.use: to purchase plastic windows, doors and fiberboard

loans.name: Festus

texts.en:
Festus has nine children, four of whom attend school. He has been operating a retail shop for the past five years selling in his neighborhood. 

Festus is requesting a loan for 30,000 KES, which he will use to purchase sugar, maize flour, and rice.  His major challenge is high prices of commodities which lead to low profits. In the future, Festus would like to sell wholesale. Hew owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, maize flour, and rice.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria es una mujer que se define como cristiana-católica, hogareña y comerciante de nacimiento: ella es oriunda del departamento de Santander, pero se declara a su vez,  Barranquillera por adopción. Vive con sus 2 hijos en las edades de 30 y 34 años y se dedica a actividades comerciales, como a la venta de mercancía variada, que promociona mediante guía especializada de productos; sus principales mercancías son la ropa interior y exterior femenina, además de accesorios para el hogar y para la mujer. Como Maria es una  mujer emprendedora e inquieta, aptitudes que recoge de la santandereana cultura,  también distribuye entre sus clientes, productos lácteos como yogurt por litro, queso mozarela y suero costeño. Ella ha visionado que su  clientela crece cada día mas, por eso  sus sueños de crecimiento crecen y su capital de trabajo le resulta insuficiente para lograr alcanzarlos. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará interiores femeninos principalmente y ropa para el día de las madres; esto con el fin de aprovechar las celebraciones que hacen las familias con motivo de esta fecha, temporada en la cual usualmente sus ventas aumentan y sus ingresos también, Así mismo necesita comprar en mayor cantidad, productos lácteos pues estos solo se los venden de contado y Maria debe tener dinero para cancelar las facturas que están por vencer y la recuperación de su cartera de créditos es mas lenta que lo que ella requiere.  Su capacidad de trabajo, actitud de crecimiento y su experiencia, convertirán esta inversión en exitosa, para el buen desempeño del negocio de Maria y esto es lo que justamente hace Kiva con sus financiaciones.
texts.en:
María is a woman who defines herself as Christian-Catholic, home-loving and a merchant by birth.  She’s from Santander Department but considers herself to be an adopted daughter of Barranquilla.

She lives with her two children who are 30 and 34 years old and she is involved in commercial activities like selling varied merchandise via catalogue.  The main kinds of merchandise se sells are women’s clothing and underwear as well as accessories for women and for the home.

Because María is an enterprising, restless woman – characteristics she gets from the culture of Santander- she also sells dairy products like yoghurt by the liter, mozzarella cheese and coastal whey among her customers.  She has noticed that her clientele is growing every day so her hopes of growth grow too and her working capital turns out to be insufficient to attain them.

This is the reason for turning to a Kiva loan, the first financing she’s gotten from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo by means of which she will buy mainly women’s underwear and clothes for Mother’s Day to take advantage of the celebrations that take place in families on account of this day, a season when her sales and her income increase.

She also needs to buy dairy products in larger amounts because she can only get these items paying cash for them and María must have cash available to pay her invoices that are about to come due and getting her accounts receivable pain in due time is sometimes slower than she’d like.

Her capacity for work, her growth attitude and her experience will make this investment successful for the good development of María’s business which is precisely what Kiva intends with its loans.

loans.use: to buy clothes and dairy products.

loans.name: Kuña Pora Aty Group

texts.es:
El comité Kuña Pora Aty se formó  en la ciudad de Curuguaty, con 13 integrantes, ellas son mujeres jefas de familia, que tienen sobre sus hombros la difícil tarea de mantener sus hogares y ayudar a sus hijos.
Elva forma parte de grupo, y nos comenta que gracias a la venta de ropas que tiene ha podido salir adelante y convertirse en una buena microempresaria. Siempre ha puesto su mayor empeño para mejorar día a día y de esa forma también ayudar a los suyos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de todo tipo, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y de esa forma poder ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes. Ellas están muy agradecidas por toda la ayuda que están recibiendo, pues le es de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The Kuña Pora Aty communal bank was formed in the city of Curuguaty with 13 members.  They are women heads of family who have on their shoulders the difficult task of supporting their homes and helping their children.

Elva is part of the group.  She tells us that, thanks to her clothing sales, she has been able to get ahead and become a good micro-entrepreneur.  She always has put forth her greatest effort to improve every day and in this way also help her loved ones.

She is requesting the loan to buy all types of garments with which she will be able to stock up and so be able to offer her customers a greater variety.

They are very grateful for all the help they are receiving because it is of great help to them.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a heifer, enhanced seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis, es agricultor, vive con su hijo, su esposa, él trabaja en lo propio, aprendió con su padre a realizar la milpa, contando con mucha experiencia.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, fertilizantes, para poder iniciar la siembra, con este préstamo obtendrá los recursos necesarios para poder ejecutar su trabajo, con la esperanza de tener una buena productividad.
La aspiración de Luis es tener éxito en la agricultura, mejorar económicamente con su familia.
texts.en:
Luís is a farmer living with his son and wife.  He works for himself having learned to grow corn with his father; he has much experience.
He’s asking for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, manure and fertilizer to start a new crop.  With this loan he’ll have the necessary resources to be able to do his work hoping to attain good productivity.

Luís’ hope is to be successful in agriculture and to improve economically with his family.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ana Francisca

texts.es:
Ana, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de mercadería para el negocio, comprándose ropa variada para niños y para adultos, trajes, blusas, faldas, camisas, con lo que espera seguir trabajando con entusiasmo y poder crecer en el mercado.
Ella manifiesta que con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo, pues su clientela encontró en su negocio lo necesario, su demanda aumento y ha logrado mantenerse competente, solamente que en este tiempo tuvo dificultades familiares, ocasionándole la separacion con su esposo.
texts.en:
Ana is asking for a new loan to buy merchandise for the business; she will buy assorted clothes for children and adults, outfits, blouses, skirts and shirts, that she hopes to use to continue working with enthusiasm in order to grow in the marketplace.

She states that she had a positive effect from the previous loan because her customers found what they needed in her business, demand increased and she’s been able to stay competitive.  She did, however, have family difficulties during this time that resulted in her separating from her husband.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Mariela Ines

texts.es: La Sra. Mariela tiene 24 años y es casada con 2 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de cámaras fotográficas y microprocesadores  ella  tiene un puesto de venta y también entrega sus pedidos a distintos tiendas y puestos de la ciudad, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Mariela utilizara este crédito en la compra de cámaras y así de esta manera seguir incrementando su capital de trabajo la Sra. Mariela enfrenta retos en su negocio que son competencia. ella va a utilizar los beneficios compra de antenas.
texts.en: Mariela, 24, is married and has two children.  She sells cameras and microprocessors.  She has a sales stand and also sells to various stores and stands in the city.  This loan will be her first sequence in the institution and Mariela will use the loan to buy cameras to continue increasing her working capital.  The business challenge Mariela faces is competition.  She will use profits to buy antennas.

loans.use: to buy cameras.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is a father of three children between the ages of 4 and 12 years, all of whom are attending school. He has been operating both a food stall and a kiosk selling retail to the local residents. Fredrick lives in his own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. He faces the challenge of high transport cost, and he says that his greatest monthly expense is school fees. He joined Yehu to get loans for his businesses. 
The loan of KES 30,000 will help him purchase wheat flour, rice, and maize flour.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, rice, and maize flour.

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en: Guillerma is 44 years old. She is a married woman with 7 children. She and her husband run a fishing business in Bien Unido, Bohol. Guillerma sells her husband's catch at the market. They sell fresh fish and crabs. Guillerma requested a loan to purchase crab traps and fishing nets. Guillerma hopes to have a progressive business.

loans.use: to purchase crab traps and fishing nets.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en: Alice is a 46-year-old widow with 5 children living in Bagumbang, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. In order to support the daily needs of the family, Alice entered into a business buying and selling fruit 3 years ago. She usually earns PHP 10,000 per month. With the help of GDMPC Microcredit which she joined last year, Alice was able to obtain more fruits to sell because of the PHP 15,000 loaned to her. Someday, she’s hoping for much greater revenue for business expansion.

loans.use: to obtain more fruit to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of seafood to sell.

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гулнара – участница группы «Айсана». Гулнаре 40 лет. Гульнара работает учителем в школе и в качестве дополнительного источника дохода для семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством.  Гулнара имеет в собственном хозяйстве 2 дойных коров, 5 овец, 1,3 га собственной и 3,0 га арендованной земли, где выращивает клевер, кукурузу и свеклу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулнара обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян и удобрений. Доходы Гулнара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Gulnara is a participant of the "Aysana" group.  She is 40 years old.  Gulnara works as a teacher at a school and to provide an additional source of income for her family, is involved in animal husbandry and farming.  Her business contains two dairy cows, five sheep, 1.3 hectares of owned and 0.3 hectares of leased land, where she grows corn and beats.  In order to further develop her business, Gulnara requested a loan in the amount of 25,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy seeds and fertilizers.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Danis Esther

texts.es: Danis  dice “Mil gracias a la gestión de Kiva por el apoyo recibido, gracias a ellos he podido adquirir nuevos equipos” Ella está muy felús desde que recibió su credikiva, porque compró una fotocopiadora y ahora tiene mas clientes y esto le representa ingresos. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará una CPU y actualizará los equipos, para entregar a sus clientes la mejor y mas rápida respuesta en el tema de tecnología, porque ellos, los clientes, son la razón de ser de su negocio.
texts.en:
Danis says, "Many thanks for the efforts of Kiva to provide me with assistance. As a result, I was able to acquire new equipment." She has been very happy since receiving her Kiva loan because she was able to buy a photocopier. Now she has more customers, which translates into revenue.

For this reason, Danis is applying for a new Kiva loan so that she can buy a CPU and upgrade her equipment, thus enabling her to serve her customers better and provide them with faster responses in terms of technology. Her customers are the reason for her to be in business.

loans.use: to buy a CPU and pay for equipment upgrades.

loans.name: Eliecer Enrique

texts.es: Eliecer  de 38 años de edad es padre de 2 hijos en las edades de 9 a 16 años. El es propietario de una pescadería en el municipio de Soledad, donde habita  y tiene su negocio, que ha funcionando de generación en generación y él lo tiene hace aproximadamente 20 años, cuando decidió emprender su propia aventura de negocios,  porque le gusta y además porque necesitaba tener dinero diariamente, para sacar adelante a sus hijos, que en la actualidad se encuentran estudiando. Su sueño mas adelante, es tener una buena infraestructura de pescadería en un local bien ubicado y cerca a su casa, pero su mayor desafío consiste en no tener el capital de trabajo suficiente para lograrlo inmediatamente. Este es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará pescado en mayor volumen y será exitosa porque incrementará sus ventas y con ello sus posibilidades de ingresos, Mientras esto ocurre maneja una rotación de cuentas por cobrar de 30 días, una rotación de inventarios diaria y una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 7%, indicadores finacieros desde los cuales proyectamos sucrecimiento. .
texts.en:
Eliecer, 38, is the father of two children who are 9 and 16 years old.  He owns a fish shop in Soledad where he lives and has his business that has been in operation from generation to generation; he’s had it for approximately 20 years when he decided to start his own business venture because he likes it and needed to earn money daily to support his children who are currently attending school.

His dream for later on is to have a good infrastructure in his fish shop and to have it well-located in a spot near home but his greatest challenge is not having enough working capital to accomplish this immediately which is precisely why he’s calling on a Kiva loan, his first financing from Fundación 
Mario Santo Domingo through which he’ll buy fish in larger amounts.  It will be successful because his sales will increase and with them potentially so too will his income.

While this occurs, his accounts receivable rotate every 30 days and his stock turns over daily; he has a profit margin of no less than 7% and these are financial indicators that we can use to project his growth.

loans.use: to buy fish in larger amounts.

loans.name: Jose Alcides

texts.es:
José, está soltero,  vive con su madre y su hermana, él es agricultor, dedicándose a la siembra de maíz, tomates, ejotes, con los cuales le ayuda a su familia para la alimentación y subsistencia de su familia.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para iniciar la siembra de maíz, por ejemplo la compra de semilla mejorada, abono y otros materiales necesarios, esto le ayudara para sentirse seguro de realizar la siembra la cual le ayudara para generar ingresos y la alimentación de la familia. 
La aspiración de José es tener una mejor calidad de vida con su familia, poder superarse en sus cultivos.
texts.en:
José is single and lives with his mother and sister. He is a farmer and grows corn, tomatoes and string beans, with which he helps feed and support his family.

He is applying for a loan to buy materials to begin planting corn, such as improved seed, fertilizer and other necessary supplies. This will help him feel confident of carrying out the planting, which will help him generate income and feed his family.

José's ambition is for him and his family to have a better quality of life, and to be able to improve his crops.

loans.use: To buy improved seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 30-year-old man from Kisumu. He is married to Eunice and they have four children between 3 and 12 years old.

Stephen operates a business selling music and movie CDs and DVDs, a business he has been doing for the last five years. He makes a monthly income of KES 13,500. 


He is now taking his first loan from KADET LTD which he will use to buy more stock of movies and music (DVDs, and CDs). He will plow his profits back into his business for better income. His dream is to be a successful entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy more stock of movies and music (DVDs and CDs).

loans.name: Susana Laura

texts.es: La Sra. Susana tiene 28 años  es soltera con 2 hijos que son de las edades de  4 y 1, ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en una tienda de barrio que se encuentra ubicado en la zona Héroes del Chaco, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Susana utilizara este préstamo  para compra de mercadería abarrotes por mayor como fideo, arroz y azúcar para surtir su  tienda,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Susana enfrenta retos en su negocio que son ser competitivo por la competencia y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando variedad de productos para satisfacer a su clientela.
texts.en: Susana, 28, is single and has two children who are 4 and 1 year old.  She sells groceries in a neighborhood store located in the Héroes de Chaco zone.  This is her first loan with the institution and Susana will use it to buy groceries like noodles, rice and sugar at wholesale to stock her store.  Her reason for requesting the loan is the lack of working capital.  The business challenge Susana faces is to stay competitive in face of the competition and she will use profits to continue to buy varied merchandise to meet customer demand

loans.use: to buy groceries at wholesale.

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru: Анаркул – участник группы «Курпулдок», 45 лет, замужем, воспитывает 2 детей. Анаркул работает в школе и в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается животноводством. На сегодня Анаркул имеет в хозяйстве 7 дойных коров, 9 бычков и 10 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку лошади.  Доходы от кредита Анаркул  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Anarkul is a member of the group "Kurpuldok". She is 45 years old, married, and raising two children. Anarkul works at a school and as an additional income she is engaged in animal husbandry. Currently Anarkul has seven dairy cows, 9 bulls and 10 sheep at her farm. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Anarkul turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of a horse. Anarkul plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her farm.

loans.use: to purchase a horse.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Jose tiene 27 años no es casado pero convive con su pareja con la cual tiene tres hijos  que son de las edades de 4, 3 y 2 años, el es agricultor tiene su parcela que se encuentra la localidad de San Carlos Limoncito, el Sr. Jose es cliente antiguo de la institución, ya que  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Jose va a usar este préstamo  para la compra de semillas para la siembra de papa y también para los gastos que implica el preparado de la tierra,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es por la falta de capital para la siembra de papa, el Sr. Jose enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su calidad de vida y va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir mejorando la siembra la cosecha de sus productos, el vende sus productos en el mercado de la localidad directamente del productor al consumidor.
texts.en:
Jose is 27 years old, he is not married, but he lives with his partner with whom he has three children aged 2, 3 and 4 years old. He is a farmer with a plot of land in the town of San Carlos Limoncito. Jose is a longstanding customer of the institution as this loan is his second loan cycle within the institution. Jose will use this loan to buy seeds to sow potatoes as well as to cover the costs involved in preparing the land. 

The reason for requesting this loan is due to a lack of capital to sow potatoes. The challenge Jose faces through his business challenge is to improve his quality of life and he will use the profits to continue to improve the sowing and harvesting of his products. He sells his products in the local market, directly from the producer to the consumer.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow potatoes.

loans.name: Carlos Nelson

texts.es:
Carlos, solicita un nuevo préstamo pues su taxi tiene fallas mecánicas  y necesita pagar mecánico para su reparación, ya que este es su fuente de ingreso para llevar a su familia lo necesario, por esto necesita mantener en buenas condiciones el vehículo.
Con la inversión del préstamo anterior logro mejorar su servicio a los clientes, manteniendo estable sus condiciones familiares.
texts.en:
Carlos is asking for a new loan because his taxi has some mechanical problems and he needs to pay a mechanic to repair it since this is his source of income to bring his family what’s necessary and this is why he needs to have the vehicle in good operating conditions.  
With his previous loan he managed to improve customer service thus maintaining his family conditions stabilized.

loans.use: to repair and service his taxi.

loans.name: Chore Poty Group

texts.es:
Descripción:	El grupo chore poty es de la ciudad de Santaní, está integrado por 10 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad. Ellas son personas muy trabajadoras y con mucho entusiasmo, ya que desean superarse y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Juana forma parte de este trabajador grupo, y ella nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de dulces de todo tipo, los cuales vende y gracias a este trabajo puede tener el dinero para poder sobrevivir día con día. Ella sueña con poder tener una gran tienda y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo como microempresaria.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de dulces, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y ayudando a los suyos para mejorar su estilo de vida.
texts.en:
The “Chore Poty” group is from the city of Santaní and it’s made up of ten women who are all friends and neighbors from this city.  They are very hardworking, very enthusiastic people since they wish to improve themselves and their living conditions.

Juana is part of this hardworking group and she comments that she sells all kinds of candy.  She sells them and thanks to this work is able to have money to survive day to day.  She dreams with having a great store to continue growing as a micro businesswoman.

She’s asking for the loan to buy candy to continue working and helping her loved ones to improve their lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy candy to sell.

loans.name: Mavlyuda

texts.ru: Мавлюда разведена и любящая мать троих детей. Более 10 лет она занимается продажей женских  национальных брюк. Она начала бизнес в 2002 году и имеет богатый опыт работы. Она шьет, а затем реализует товар на рынке. Начала данный бизнес с собственными денежными средствами. Мавлюда запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки тканей для пошива  женских национальных брюк. Она надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en:
Mavlyuda is divorced and the loving mother of three children. She has been engaged in selling women's national dresses for more than 10 years. She started this business in 2002 and has extensive experience. She sews the products, and then she sells them at the market. She started this business with her own money. 

Mavlyuda requests a loan in the amount of 5000 somoni for the purchase of fabrics for sewing women's national dresses. She hopes for your kindness and mercy.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for sewing women's national dresses for selling

loans.name: Jose Horacio

texts.es:
José, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tambien la crianza de cerdos, él vive con sus dos hijos de 8 y 10 años de edad, él se dedica a realizar la siembra desde hace 15 años, trabaja todos los días de 6:00am a 3:00pm, hasta la fecha no presenta problemas en su actividad.
Él solicita un préstamo para el pago del arrendamiento del terreno, pues iniciara el cultivo de maíz y frijol y quiere tener seguro el terreno donde realizara su labor, este préstamo será una gran ayuda con la que podre darle continuidad a sus cultivos.
El propósito de José es por medio de su trabajo poder apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios y que en su hogar no perezcan por alimentación.
texts.en:
José grows corn and beans and also raises pigs.  He lives with his children who are 8 and 10 years old.  He’s been planting for the last 15 years and works every day from 6am until 3pm.  To date he’s had no problems with his activity.

He’s asking for a loan to pay the land lease because he’s about to start planting corn and beans and he needs to secure a parcel of land on which to do so.  This loan will be a great help to him in order to give continuity to his crops.

José’s aim is to support his children’s schooling by means of his work and that at home they should never lack food.

loans.use: to pay land lease.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres “Virgen de Fátima” está en su primer ciclo, está integrado por 12 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Ybycui. Las señoras son muy unidas, responsables y solidarias, cuentan que tienen muchas ganas de trabajar y salir adelante, tanto con el grupo y familiarmente.
Maria Fatima es una de las miembros, ella se dedica a la lavandería, y comenta que tiene muchos clientes que siempre le llevan ropas para que ella las pueda lavar. Es un trabajo muy sacrificado, pero ella está muy orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo digno y honesto.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de detergentes en polvo, suavizantes para ropas y demás insumos necesarios con los cuales podrá seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con sus pedidos.
texts.en:
The “Virgen de Fátima” women's committee is in its first loan cycle. It is composed of 12 women, who are all friends and neighbors in the city of Ybycui. These women have great unity, responsibility and solidarity, and they report that they have a strong desire to work and get ahead, both with the group and in their families. 

Maria Fatima is one of the members. Her business is a laundry, and she comments that she has a lot of customers who always bring her their clothing to wash. It is a job involving much sacrifice, but she is very proud of what she does, since it is dignified and honest work. 

She is requesting the loan to buy powdered detergents, fabric softener and other supplies, with which she will be able to keep working and fulfill her orders.

loans.use: to buy powdered detergents, fabric softeners and other supplies.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando  es un hombre polifacético, estudió diseño Textil, tiene dos negocios, una ebanistería generadora de sus principales ingresos, es de tradición familiar pues sus padres también trabajaron en este mismo oficio y tambien tiene una refresquería, donde vende refrescos y fritos y es apoyado por su cónyuge. Su experiencia en la ebanistería data de más de 25 años, por eso hoy tiene una gran diversidad de productos que ofrece en su portafolio; él elabora muebles para el hogar, como juegos de sala, de alcobas, puertas, mecedores y artículos decorativos como lámparas, floreros, fruteras, y bases  principalmente. Su meta mas adelante, es comercializar artículos decorativos al por mayor, pues en la actualidad solo produce por encargos a sus clientes. Su mayor desafío es lograr un capital de trabajo suficiente para responder a sus expectativas de crecimiento y esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer crédito que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará madera, pintura pegante y otros insumos para producir en mayor volumen y  ganar descuentos especiales , para así mismo vender en importantes cantidades. Su razón de éxito es su experiencia, la calidad con que desarrolla su obra y porque sus actividades de preventa así se lo indican.
texts.en:
Armando’s a versatile man; he studied Textile Design and has two businesses: a wood working shop which is his main income producer and that’s a family tradition because his parents also worked in this same occupation and he also has a snack bar where he sells soft-drinks and snacks and that his spouse helps him with.

His wood working experience dates back 25 years so today he has a wide variety of products in his portfolio: he manufactures furniture for the home like living room sets, bedroom sets, doors, rocking chairs and decorative items like lamps, vases, fruit bowls and bases primarily. His goal for later on is to sell decorative items at wholesale because he’s currently just producing to customer order.  

His greatest challenge is having sufficient working capital to meet growth expectations and this is precisely why he’s calling on a Kiva loan, his first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy wood, paint, glue and other supplies needed to produce in greater volume and to earn special discounts so that in this same manner he can sell in significant amounts.  The reason he will be successful is his experience and the quality with which he does his work and because his presale activities so indicate.

loans.use: to buy wood, paint, glue and other supplies.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия замужем и заботливая мать четверых детей. Её супруг работает зав складом на овощном складе. Зулфия очень трудолюбивая женщина, начиная с 2000 года она занимается продажей национальных платьев. Торгует в оптовой части рынка, имеет постоянных клиентов. Зулфия хотела бы получить займ для развития бизнеса, а именно для покупки тканей для шитья национальной женской одежды. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Zulfiya is married and the caring mother of four children. Her husband is the head of a warehouse stocking vegetables. Zulfiya is a very hard working woman, who has been engaged in selling national dresses since 2000. She trades in the wholesale area of the market, and she has regular customers. 

Zulfiya would like to receive a loan for the development of her business, and specifically for the purchase of fabrics for sewing women's national clothing. She hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for sewing women's national dresses for reselling

loans.name: Rysbu

texts.ru:
Рысбу 63 года, замужем. Рысбу на протяжении 15 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Рысбу в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  3 коровы, 10 овец и 1 лошадь, продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 15,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рысбу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить надои.  Доходы от кредита Рысбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Rysbu is 63 years old, and married. Rysbu has been engaged in animal husbandry for a period of 15 years, having started this business with 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to persistent work, Rysbu currently has three cows, 10 sheep and one horse on her farm, and the sale of milk and dairy products brings in around 15,000 som (KGS) per month. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Rysbu turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 135,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of dairy cows, which will allow her to increase the milk production. Rysbu plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of farm animals.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows

loans.name: Upan

texts.ru:
Упан 58 лет, вдова. Упан с 1991 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Упан в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 корова, 2 теленок, 30 коз и овец, продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 20,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Упан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить надои.  Доходы от кредита Упан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Upan is 58 years old, and a widow. Upan has been engaged in animal husbandry since 1991, having started this business with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to persistent work, Upan currently has one cow, two calves and 30 sheep and goats on her farm, and the sale of milk and dairy products brings in around 20,000 som (KGS) per month. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Upan turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of dairy cows, which will allow her to increase the milk production. Upan plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of domestic animals.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows

loans.name: Aynaz

texts.ru:
Айназ 51 год, замужем. Айназ 25 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки 2 овец. Благодаря упорному труду Айназ ее хозяйство на сегодняшний  день  приносит  12,000 сом (KGS) с продажи молока.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айназ обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Айназ планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Aynaz is 51 years old, and married. 25 years ago, Aynaz started working with animal husbandry, having started the business with the purchase of two sheep. Thanks to Aynaz' persistent work, her farm currently brings in around 12,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of milk. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Aynaz turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) for purchasing additional heads of cattle. Aynaz plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of domestic animals.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.es: El señor  Lázaro  es  una persona  trabajadora  la  cual  ya  ha  tenido  varios créditos  en la  institución en los cuales  se  ha  caracterizado por   tener  una excelente  cultura  de pagos, en  este  momento  requiere  de  nuestro  apoyo  para  realizar  su  proyecto,  el cual consiste   en pintar   y  enyesar   las  paredes   exteriores  de  su   vivienda   la  cual   con esfuerzo y  perseverancia  adquirió,  agradece   el apoyo  brindado para   hacer  de  su  sueño una  realidad.
texts.en: Lázaro is a hardworking person who has had several loans from the institution that he’s repaid in an excellent way.  At present he needs out support to carry out a project consisting in painting and sealing the exterior walls of his house which with great effort and perseverance he acquired.  He is grateful for the support provided to make his dream a reality.

loans.use: to paint and seal the exterior walls of his home

loans.name: César

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 27 años, es un joven soltero, muy laborioso. Vive en su casa propia construida de material rústico. 
Desde hace 5 años se dedica a la siembra de cacao, el trabajo lo realiza solo, pero en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros. Lo que más le gusta de su labor es poder cosechar en compaña de sus amigos. Y lo que le resulta difícil es tener que combatir las plagas que en tiempo de lluvia aparecen. 
Es por ello que acude a las oficinas de MFP, para solicitar un préstamo que ayude a cumplir con sus planes de trabajo. 
Para más adelante desea incrementar sus plantas de cacao; pero por ahora está priorizando realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos para que tenga una buena producción.

Éste es su crédito número 4 con MFP, por el que se siente agradecido debido a la confianza brindada. Por ello, se compromete a ser puntual en sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es un socio partícipe de las actividades que realiza el grupo.
Con el préstamo que ahora solicita comprará abono y otros fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de sus plantas.
texts.en:
Cesar is 27 years old and single. He is a very hardworking young man and lives in his own home, which is built with rudimentary materials. 

He has been growing cocoa beans for 5 years. He works on his own, but during the harvest season he hires laborers. What he likes the most about his work is being able to harvest in the company of his friends. And what he finds challenging is having to perform pest control during the rainy season.

This is why he comes to the MFP offices, so that he can request a loan that will help him carry out his work plan.

Eventually he would like to have more cocoa plants, but for now his priority is maintaining his crops in order to obtain high production.

This is his 4th loan with MFP, and he is grateful for the trust deposited in him. For this reason he is committed to paying his installments timely. He is an active member of the communal bank, and he participates in the group's activities. 

He will use the loan he is presently requesting to purchase manure and other fertilizers to maintain his plants.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Uulkan

texts.ru:
Уулкан 53 года. Уулкан после распада Союза начала заниматься животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Уулкан ее хозяйство на сегодняшний  день  насчитывает 5 коров, 8 овец и коз и приносит  около 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Уулкан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 90,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Уулкан планирует вложить в постройку дополнительного сарая .
texts.en:
Uulkan is 53 years old. After the breakup of the Soviet Union, Uulkan began working with animal husbandry, starting the business with 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Uulkan's persistent work, her farm currently includes five cows and eight sheep and goats, and brings in around 20,000 som (KGS) per month. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Uulkan turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 90,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of additional heads of cattle. Uulkan plans to invest the income from the loan in the construction of an additional shed.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru:
Гулмире 44 года. Гулмира после распада Союза начала заниматься животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 4,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гулмиры,  ее хозяйство на сегодняшний  день  насчитывает 2 коров, 2 телят и 2 бычков и приносит  около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулмира обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота на откорм и перепродажу.  Доходы от кредита Гулмира планирует вложить в ремонт дома и дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Gulmira is 44 years old. After the breakup of the Soviet Union, Gulmira became engaged in animal husbandry, starting this business with a sum of 4,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulmira's persistent work, the farm currently includes two cows, two calves and two bulls, and brings in around 6,000 som (KGS) per month. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Gulmira turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of additional heads of cattle to fatten and resell. Gulmira plans to invest the income from the loan in repairing her house and further developing her farm.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
José, vive con sus tres hijos de 19, 17 y 23 años de edad y su esposa, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 25 años, este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres, trabaja todos los días de 6:00am a 3:00pm, hasta la fecha no ha tenido inconvenientes.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas para el cultivo de maíz y frijol, pues es necesario aplicarles abono y herbicidas, para evitar cualquier riesgo de plagas, este préstamo le ayudara para comprar todo lo necesario y así poder realizar el cultivo en una manzana de terreno el maíz y en media manzana el frijol.
La aspiración de José es que sus hijos puedan estar apoyados por él con el fin de terminar sus estudios, pues así tendrán mejores oportunidades, además que no les falte la alimentación diaria.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and three children, ages 19, 17, and 23. He grows corn and beans, and has been doing this work for 25 years. He learned this work from his parents, and works every day from 6:00am to 3:00pm. To date he has not had problems.  

He is applying for a loan to buy agricultural supplies for growing corn and beans, as it is necessary to apply fertilizer and herbicides to avoid any risk of crop pests. This loan will help him purchase everything he needs, enabling him to cultivate a manzana (1.68 acres) of land sown in corn, and a half manzana sown in beans.

José's ambition is to support his children, so that they can complete their schooling, as this way they will have better opportunities, and also won't lack their daily sustenance.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, vive con su esposo, tiene 66 años de edad, viven con tres nietos de 24, 10 y 9 años de edad, estos nietos quedaron a su cargo luego de su hija muriera, Juana con su esposo y su nieto mayor, realizan al siembra de maíz y frijol, esto lo aprendieron jóvenes con sus padres.
Actualmente están iniciando el cultivo de invierno, y Juana solicita un préstamo para la compra de semilla mejorada y fertilizantes,  con esto estará obteniendo los recursos necesarios para poder desarrollar la siembra y poder obtener buenos resultados.
Su aspiración es mejorar la vida de sus nietos, poderles ayudar para que se puedan defender en un futuro con todo para su propia vida.
texts.en:
Juana lives with her husband and three grandchildren, ages 24, 10, and 9.  They came to take care of these grandchildren after their daughter died.  Juana, her husband, and their oldest grandchild grow corn and beans.  They learned it from their parents when they were young.

Currently they are starting the winter crop.  Juana is requesting a loan to buy improved seed and fertilizer.  With this she will be getting the necessary resources to be able to develop the crop and get good results.

Her goal is to improve her grandchildren's life and be able to help them so they can take care of themselves in their own lives in the future.

loans.use: to buy improved seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Heidy

texts.es: Heidy  de 34 años vive al sur de la ciudad, con su hija  en la  edad  de 3; ella es el motor de su vida y que sueña con verla convertida en una profesional de éxito. Heidy inició su vida comercial vendiendo artículos de plata, gradualmente ha ido agregando ropa, calzado, que son los principales artículos que vende a clientes del barrio y referidos que trabajan en diferentes empresas.  Su negocio le “ha servido de mucho”,  porque con él ha logrado sacar a su hija adelante y estudiar una carrera universitaria. En la actualidad ha recibido 4 financiamientos con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante los cuales ha logrado aumentar su capital de trabajo, crecer y despertar cada vez más su credibilidad entre sus proveedores. Su credikiva es el quinto financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará ropa para damas, caballeros e infantil y bolsos, será exitosa esta inversión porque conoce bien el mercado, inyectará su capital de credikiva en una temporada de buen auge comercial y responderá a las necesidades de su clientela, rotando rápidamente los productos que compre. Mientras esto ocurre, maneja una  rotación de cuentas por cobrar no menor de 30 días, una rentabilidad no menor del 30% y desde allí planea su crecimiento empresarial con el apoyo de su credikiva.
texts.en:
Heidy, 34, lives in the south of the city with her daughter, 3, who is the driving force of her life.  She dreams about seeing her daughter become a successful professional.

Heidy started her business life selling things made of silver.  Gradually she has added clothing and footwear, which are the main things she sells to the customers in the neighborhood and referrals who work in different businesses.  Her business "has been of great use to her" because she has been able to get her daughter ahead and take university classes.

Currently she has received four loans with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo with which she has been able to increase her working capital, grow, and stir interest in her credibility among her suppliers.

Her Kiva loan is the fifth loan she has requested from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With it she will buy clothing for women, men, and children as well as purses.

This loan will be successful because she knows the market well.  She will invest her Kiva loan at the peak of the commercial season and will respond to the needs of her customers, quickly turning around any products she buys.  While this happens, she manages a turnover of accounts for charging for no less than 30 days, a profitability no less than 30%.  From there she plans her business growth with the support of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy clothing for women, men, and children, and to buy purses.

loans.name: Blanca Teresa

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer de 29 años de edad, es madre soltera, con un hijo a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su hijo y su tía heredada por su abuelo, ella vive en el distrito de Tambogrande, departamento de Piura. Así mismo cuenta con todos los servicios básicos.

La actividad principal que desarrolla Blanca es la venta de útiles escolares, de escritorio, artículos de plástico como: cuadernos, lapiceros, lápices, reglas, borradores, perforadores, engrampadores, grapas, papeles, vinifan, tajadores, plumones indelebles,  etc. Lo cual cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona, en este negocio lleva tres años de experiencia. Así mismo su tía también le apoya en este tipo de actividades.


El monto del préstamo solicitado por Blanca es de S/. 3000 nuevos soles, lo cual será para  comprar  útiles escolares para su librería, y de esta forma seguir creciendo con su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca is 29, and a single mother with a son in her care. She lives with her son and her aunt, in her own house that was left to her by her grandfather. She lives in Tambogrande district, in Piura department. As well, she has all the basic services.

The main activity that Blanca carries out is the sale of school and office supplies, items such as notebooks, pens, pencils, rulers, erasers, hole punchers, staplers, staples, paper, binders, pencil sharpeners, indelible felt-tip pens, etc.  She has an already established clientele in the area, and has three years of experience in this business. In addition, her aunt helps her in these activities.

The amount of the loan that Blanca has applied for is 3000 nuevos soles, which will be to buy school supplies for her bookstore. This way she will continue to make her business grow and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy school supplies for her business.

loans.name: Melvin

texts.es:
Melvin es un joven de 25 años de edad,  es agricultor desde muy temprana edad  y vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos en  una comunidad de la zona Sur de Costa Rica, ubicada en Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas. La economía local está basada en actividades agropecuarias, donde destaca la siembra de tubérculos, café, maíz, frijoles y ganadería.

Melvin tiene esta actividad agrícola como única fuente de ingreso para mantener a su familia, sus hijos aún son muy pequeños por lo tanto él piensa en darles una excelente calidad de vida y una buena educación académica.

El necesita un préstamo por el monto de ₡600.000 (seiscientos mil colones),  ya que al ser agricultor necesita este dinero para la compra de semilla de maíz y suministros para mantenerlo hasta cosechar el producto. El destaca que su objetivo es aumentar sus ingresos económicos por medio de esta actividad agrícola,  superarse como ser humano, obtener una vida digna y mayor solvencia económica para él y su familia.

Este es su primer préstamo y es socio de la  Empresa de Crédito Comunal de La Danta S.A.  y manifiesta estar muy agradecido porque este es un medio de adquirir financiamiento de acceso rápido y a plazos aceptables para gente trabajadora y que desea superarse como esw su caso.
texts.en:
Melvin is a 25 year-old youth who has been a farmer from a very young age.  He lives with his wife and their two children in a community in the southern part of Costa Rica, located in  Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas.  Here the economy is based on agricultural activities, especially the cultivation of tubers, coffee, corn, beans, and livestock production.

Melvin's agricultural work supports his family.  His children are still very young, and so he is planning on giving them an excellent quality of life and a very good education.

He needs a loan in the sum of 600,000 Costa Rican colones because, as he is a farmer, he needs to buy corn seeds and farming supplies to maintain his crops until the harvest.  His main objectives are to increase his income through farming, to excel as a human being, and to obtain a decent life and better economic solvency for himself and his family.

This is his first loan, and he is a member of the "La Danta" communal bank.  He says that he is very grateful, because this is a means through which he can quickly acquire financing at reasonable terms for working people who want to succeed, as in his case.

loans.use: to buy seeds and supplies

loans.name: Blanca Flor

texts.es: Blanca Flor, tiene la edad de 44 años, es casada y vive con su esposo. Ella quiere  comprar, Telas, Hilos, botones…… para utilizar en su Taller de costura en  su casa.   Tiene varios años que se dedica a fabricar ropa de todo tipo, la cual vende en su propio taller y sale a vender casa por casa, quiere crecer y también desea que su actividad sea muy productiva. Es el tercer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. No  ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. Ella  también tiene el deseo de mejorar su situación económica poniendo a producir más el taller y poder hacer un ahorro para su futuro y también ayudarle a su esposo.
texts.en: Blanca Flor is 44 years old, married, and lives with her husband. She wants to purchase fabric, thread, buttons, etc. for use at her home sewing shop. For several years, she has worked making all kinds of clothing, which she sells from her own shop, as well as door to door. She wants to expand and also would like her activity to become highly productive. This is the third loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hasn't received loans from state banks or credit unions, but FUDECOSUR granted her a loan with easier payment terms and their interest rate is much lower. She also wishes to improve her financial situation by increasing her shop's output, so that she can save for the future and also help her husband.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Cholpon

texts.ru: Чолпон – участник группы «Курпулдок», замужем, воспитывает 2 детей. Чолпон занимается животноводством,  имеет в хозяйстве 5 дойных коров, 2 бычка и 1 лошадь. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чолпон обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 90,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Чолпон планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья.
texts.en: Cholpon is a participant of the "Kurpuldok" group, married and raising two children.  She is involved in animal husbandry and owns five dairy cows, two bulls and one horse.  In order to further develop her business, Cholpon requested a loan in the amount of 90,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of young livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings into a further increase of livestock headcount.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Janylmyrza

texts.ru:
Жанылмурза – лидер группы «Курпулдок», замужем.  Жанылмурза занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес в 1982 году с суммы 6,000 сом (KGS).  Имея в хозяйстве 3 дойные коровы, 4 лошади и 2 бычка, и получая прибыль в сумме около 15,000 сом в месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов, Жанылмурза намерена и далее развивать животноводство.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жанылмурза обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Жанылмурза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья.
texts.en: Janylmyrza is the leader of the "Kurpuldok" group and married.  She is involved in animal husbandry, having started this business in 1982 with a sum of 6,000 som (KGS).  Having three dairy cows, four horses and two bulls and earning a profit of about 15,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and milk products, Janylmyrza intends to continue developing her animal husbandry business.  In order to further grow her business, Janylmyrza requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of young livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings into a further increase of livestock headcount.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Tello

texts.es: Elizabeth es socia del Bancomunal Sol Radiante, tiene 42 años de edad, es casada y madre de 3 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú  hace 16 años. Se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos por catálogo. Se siente orgullosa de todo lo que ha logrado con su ahorro, le gusta mucho las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal porque le enseñaron a valorarse a sí misma, está muy agradecida con la institución. El nuevo préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y cosméticos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the “Sol Radiante” (Radiant Sun) communal bank.  She is 42 years old, married, and has three children.

She has been a member of Finca Perú for 16 years.  She sells clothes and cosmetics by catalog.  She is proud of all that she has achieved with her savings.  She really likes the trainings that she gets in her communal bank because they taught her to value herself.  She is very grateful to the institution.

She will use the new requested loan to buy clothes and cosmetics for her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell in her business.

loans.name: Ziynat

texts.ru: Зыйнат – участник группы «Курпулдок», 39 лет, замужем, воспитывает 2 детей. Зыйнат работает учителем в школе и в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодня Зыйнат имеет в хозяйстве 1 дойную корову, 2 бычка и землю, где она выращивает клевер, ячмень и сахарную свеклу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зыйнат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку семян сахарной свеклы и удобрений.  Доходы от кредита Зыйнат  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Ziynat is a participant of the "Kurpuldok" group.  She is 39 years old, married and raising two children.  Ziynat works as a teacher at a school and to provide an additional source of income, is involved in animal husbandry and farming.  Today, she owns a dairy cow, two bulls and land, where she grows clover, barley and sugar beats.  In order to further develop her business, Ziynat requested a loan in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy sugar beat seeds and fertilizers.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: El Aserradero Group

texts.es:
Doña Adela es uno de los integrantes de un grupo llamado El Aserradero el cual esta 

integrado 18 personas las cuales desidieron llamar a si a su grupo para que la gente 

identificara  ya que usaron el nombre de su comunidad, laprincipal actividad 

economica es la siembra y cultivo de caña de azucar, este grupo es muy carismatico, 

trabajador y unido sus integrantes son:

Maria Felix venta de ropa 
Maurilia carpinteria
Adela abarrotes
Brijida venta de refrescos
Ricarda venta de ropa
Isadora venta de cosmeticos
Maria del Socorro venta de pollo 
Berenice venta de carne
Isabel venta de antojitos 
Eugenio venta de abarrotes
Cruzventa de ropa
Nancy alicia venta de frutas y legumbres
Maria de los Angeles venta de comida
Alma nelly venta de zapatos 
Daria venta de antijitos 
Obdulia venta de zapatos 
Demecia venta de antojitos 
Marcelaventa de antojitos

Doña Adela tiene la edad de 53 años, estudios hasta el quinto grado de pimaria y esta casada con el señor angel  y sus hijos ya estan casados,ella nos pltica que siempre a tenido que trabajar primero para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar pero actualmente ella tiene que ver por su familia ya que su esposo esta discapacitado, doña adela platica que inicio vendiendo carne de cerdo y carne enchilada con sus amigos y vecinos de la comunidad  pero ella siempre habia querido tener  una pequeña tienda de abarrotes  y Gracias a su trabajo hace un año construyo un pequeño local junto a su casa en el cual abrio su tienda de abarrotes, ella dice simpre le gusta tener surtido su negocio para que sus clientes siempre encuentren lo que busquen, apesar de que ya tiene su tienda de abarrotes ella continua relizando sus ventas de carne y su esposo la ayuuda a atender la tienda.

Ella invertira su credito en la compra de ceite de cocina, comida enlatada, frijoles, arroz, refrescos, dulces, sabritas, pan dulce, galletas, sal , azucar y mayonesa para resurtir su negocio.

ella desea que con esta inversion su negocio continue prosperando ya que desea tener una mejor calidad de vida y sus ganancias las invertira en resurtir su negocio.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, canned food, beans, rice, soft drinks, sweets, chips, sweet bread, biscuits, salt, sugar and mayonnaise.

location.town: Aserradero, Acatlan de Perez Figueroa, Oaxaca

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор замужем и на воспитании имеет троих дочерей и одного сына. Супруг занимается продажей строительных материалов, а Гулбахор более 6 лет занимается приготовлением плова на рынке строительных материалов. В месяц 28 дней работает. Благодаря бизнесу она содержит своих детей в хороших условиях. Имеет много постоянных клиентов. Кредитуется в ИМОН Интернешнл несколько лет, имеет хорошую репутацию и кредитную историю. Гулбахор запрашивает займ для достройки  веранды и потолков, также для закупка гипсокартона.
texts.en: Gulbahor is married and bringing up three daughters and a son. Her husband sells construction materials, while Gulbahor has been preparing pilaf at the market for constructions materials for more than six years. She works 28 days out of the month. Because of her business, she keeps her children in good circumstances. Gulbahor has many regular clients. She has received loans from IMON International for several years, has a good reputation and credit history. Gulbahor is seeking a loan for construction of a veranda and ceilings, as well as for the purchase of drywall.

loans.use: To purchase of drywall

loans.name: Ledelia

texts.en:
Ledelia is a 42-year-old married woman with four children aged between 4 and 18 years. Her husband works as a fisherman.

Ledelia runs a small sari-sari store business. She sells vinegar, soy sauce, and spices. Ledelia requested a loan to buy more merchandise to sell such as canned goods and toiletries. She hopes to increase her sales and profitability. She also hopes to venture into other businesses in the future.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell such as canned goods and toiletries.

loans.name: Marie Rosine

texts.en:
Marie Rosine is 27 years old. She is married to a carpenter and they have three children. 

She has been selling onions for the past six years. The loan will be used for buying more onions to sell. She plans to use the profits from the business for savings.

loans.use: to buy more onions to sell.

loans.name: Sum

texts.en:
Sum is 60 years old, a humble resident who permanently lives in Kampong Chhnang province. She owns and manages a rice farming business to generate a livelihood. Agriculture is the main source of her income. She has been engaged in this business for almost 20 years. Normally, she is able to make income approximately of USD 4.00 per day to cover her daily expenses. She particularly uses her income to spend on food and her daily allowances.

Sum would like to expand her land size and thereby increase her household income. So now she is asking for a loan of KHR 1,000,000 from HKL to purchase an additional plot of farmland for farming purposes. Though this investment, Sum hopes to further improve her business and better her living standard. This is her first loan and she is confident of being able to pay her loan back punctually.

loans.use: to purchase an additional plot of farmland for farming purposes.

loans.name: Lillian

texts.en:
Lillian is 38 years old, married to Robert, and blessed with five children aged 16, 12, eight, four and three years. She owns a boutique cum salon, a business she started five years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 20,000. 

She has requested a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase ladies' skirt suits, trouser suits, shoes and handbags for sale. The profit she earns will be ploughed back into her business. 

Her dream is to give her children the best education as well as see her business expand to greater levels. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To purchase ladies' skirt suits, trouser suits, ladies' shoes and handbags.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta is from D' Fernan, Bonifacio. She is 43 years old. Marieta is married and has 4 children. To make a living, Marieta owns & operates a general store. She has been in her business for 6 years and earns 20,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2008, Marieta joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 40,200 PHP which will be used to obtain products such as shampoo, some food for snacks, sugar, soap & toothpaste. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to obtain products such as shampoo, some food for snacks, sugar, soap & toothpaste

loans.name: Julio Ernesto

texts.es:
Julio, vive en casa propia con su familia, sus cuatro hijos y su esposa, él se dedica a trabajar la agricultura, desde pequeño inicio en este trabajo ya que su padre tambien ha sido agricultor.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de 2000 plantas de chile, abono y foliares, para poder iniciar su siembra de chiles, con este préstamo tendrá la oportunidad de iniciar nuevamente un cultivo del cual espera recibir buenos frutos.
El objetivo de Julio es poder ayudar a su familia, por medio de su trabajo, generándoles una mejor condición económica, apoyando a sus hijos en todo lo que ellos necesiten.
texts.en:
Julio lives in his own house with his family: his wife and four children. He is a farmer, and began this work at a young age, as his father had also been a farmer.

He is applying for a loan to buy 2000 chili pepper plants, as well as organic and foliar fertilizers, in order to start planting his chili pepper crop. With this loan he will have the opportunity to again start a crop, from which he expects to receive good results.

Julio's aim is to be able to help his family through his work, creating a better economic situation for them, and supporting his children in everything that they need.

loans.use: To buy 2000 chili pepper plants, as well as organic and foliar fertilizers.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is 43 years old, married, and has four children. He owns a spare parts shop which he has been operating for eleven years. He started as a mechanic and then later saved to start the shop. 

He faces challenges of power regularly being off. His family goal is to educate his children. He wishes to expand his business to new markets. He intends to use the loan for purchasing spare parts.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Agua De Coihue Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Agua de Coihue” está conformado por 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; vivero de flores y arboles, comida rápida, venta de ropa, venta de mermeladas, peluquería, artesanía en tejidos. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la cuidad de Chillan.
María, Secretaria del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie ocupando la segunda fila de derecha a izquierda, viste con polera blanca y encima lleva un chaleco de color negro, usa lentes, su cabello lo usa tomado.
Ella se dedica al rubro de ventas de joyas hace 2 meses, en el cual trabaja sola.
La mercadería que necesita la compra en Chillan, donde encuentra productos a mitad de precio.
Con el crédito comprará joyas que incluirán más accesorios para sus clientes.
Las metas están enfocadas en tener un local en Coihueco.
María vive junto a su marido quien se desempeña como chofer y juntos a sus 2 hijos pequeños. Sus sueños son poder tener su propio local.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza para invertir en su negocio. Además  se siente muy contenta con el grupo que participa en el cual existe mucha confianza.
Chillán es una comuna de la zona centro sur de Chile. Su nombre significa “silla del sol” en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches. Chillán es conocida como “Cuna de la Patria” o “Tierra de Artistas”, debido a que en la ciudad han nacido destacados personajes de la historia de Chile, como por ejemplo el conocido pianista Claudio Arrau.
texts.en:
This community bank is called “Agua de Coihue” (Water of Coihue) and it is made up of 17 entrepreneurs in different activities, among which are the growing of trees and flowers, fast food, clothing sales, marmalade sales, hair styling, knitted handicrafts.  They are all residents of the city of Chillan.
Maria, secretary of the community bank, can be found in the picture standing in the second row from right to left, dressed in a while polo shirt with a black vest on top, wearing glasses and her hair twisted. She has been in jewelry sales for two months, an activity that she performs alone.  The merchandise that she needs she buys in Chillan, where she can find products at half price.
With the loan she will buy jewelry that will include more accessories for her customers. Her goals are focused on getting a space in Coihueco.
Maria lives with her husband, who works as a driver, and their two children.  Her dreams are to have her own store.
She is very happy and thankful with the support that she has received from Fondo Esperanza to invest in her business.  She is also very happy with the group where she belongs in which she finds mutual trust.
Chillan is a community in the south central area of Chile.  The name means "seat of the sun" in mapudungun, the language of the native mapuches.
Chillan is known as the "Craddle of the Country" or "Land of Artists" because in this city several well known people in Chile's history were born, such as the distinguished pianist Claudio Arrau.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry that will provide more accessories for her customers.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is aged 35. She is a mother of three children aged between one and 12. The oldest child goes to school. Marie owns a general store which she has been running for the past six years. With the loan, she plans to add more items in the store such as sugar, maize flour, rice, and salt to sell. The profits from the business will be used for making more savings to reinvest again for the better future of the business.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, maize flour and salt to sell.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 32 years old and is a married woman with 4 children aged between 2 and 14 years. She and her husband run a fishing business in Bien Unido, Bohol. Marilyn sells her husband's catch at the market. She applied for a loan to purchase fishing nets and gasoline for the boat. This will bring in more fish for Marilyn to sell. 

Marilyn hopes to purchase an additional fishing boat in the future. She also hopes for her children to finish college and become successful.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and gasoline for the boat

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en: Esterlita is a married woman with three children. Esterlita is 50 years old and resides at Mantic, Tangub City, Philippines. Esterlita used her last loan to purchase additional products to sell. Her business grew and become successful. Now, she's taking out a new loan to buy more "ukay-ukay" (used clothing) to sell. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business even more.

loans.use: to buy more "ukay-ukay" (used clothing) to sell

loans.name: Haron

texts.en:
Haron is a 42-year-old man from Bungoma. He is married to Eunice and they have three children aged between 10 and 18 years.

Haron sells mobile phones and accessories, a business he has been doing for the last six years. He makes a monthly income of KES 150,000. 

He is taking his second KADET LTD loan, which he will use to buy phone accessories and mobile phones for sale. He will use the profits to open another business outlet. His dream is to have a stable business.

loans.use: to buy phone accessories and mobile phones for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Marie Grace

texts.en: Marie Grace is 35 years old. She sells skirts and has been in the business for four years. She is married and has three children; all of them go to school. She has requested this loan to buy more skirts to sell. The profits from the business will be used for paying school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.
